École Supérieure Privée des Sciences Jur: Private Higher School of Legal, Economic and Political Sciences
Signature de la convention de partenaria: Signature of the partnership agreement with
la Confédération des Entreprises Citoyen: the Confederation of Citizen Enterprises of Tunisia “CONECT”
Signature de convention de partenariat e: Signature of a partnership agreement between the Private Superior School of Legal, Economic and Political Sciences of Tunis- Business Law And Politics “BLP” and the Confederation of Citizen Enterprises of Tunisia “CONECT”, with Mr Tarak Chérif the President of CONECT, a great opportunity which opens to our students the portals of the most outstanding companies in Tunisia.
